ygData.subject: Re: Back to good stuff, LOOT! and Levels!
ygData.msgSnippet: Nope, the Single Target cancel magic will not work on a group member unless you are dueling.  You have to use the group one to debuff. Remember, dispells are
ygData.messageBody:
Nope, the Single Target cancel magic will not work on a group member
unless you are dueling. You have to use the group one to debuff.
Remember, dispells are now considered aggressive actions so they
won't work on a non-pvp server unless dueling.

Rosha Cristi, Bard of 51 {insert something musical here}
Guild Leader, Legends
Innoruuk
